parameters.text:
=extract any backlinks available from the following url:
{{ $json.url }}

parameters.content:
## ‚úÖ **üîµ SECTION 1: Input & Trigger**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Trigger: Manual Execute**
![‚ö°](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/high-voltage_26a1.png)

* **What it does:** This node starts the workflow manually when you click ‚ÄúExecute Workflow.‚Äù
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** It‚Äôs the simplest way to test your workflow on demand. Later, you can swap this with a **Schedule** node for daily or weekly runs.

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Set: Competitor Domain**
![üìù](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/memo_1f4dd.png)

* **What it does:** This node stores the **competitor‚Äôs domain** you want to analyze.
* **Example:** `ahrefs.com` or `moz.com`
* **Why it‚Äôs useful:** You can easily change domains without modifying the whole workflow. For multiple competitors, loop through them!

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ **Simple input control:** You don‚Äôt need to touch code ‚Äî just type your competitor‚Äôs domain in one place.
‚úÖ **Reusable:** Same input can be reused for any site ‚Äî just update the domain value.

---

---

## ‚úÖ **ü§ñ SECTION 2: Agent Scrape Engine**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Agent: Scrape Backlinks (Bright Data MCP)**
![ü§ñ](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/robot_1f916.png)

* **What it does:** Calls your **custom scraping Agent** that uses Bright Data MCP to visit backlink explorer pages (like Ahrefs or Moz) and pull backlink data.
* **How:** The Agent uses a secure proxy network to get around anti-bot protections and scrapes backlink profiles (URL, anchor text, type, etc.).
* **Output:** Raw JSON with all backlinks found for the competitor.

**Sub-Nodes:**

* ‚öôÔ∏è **MCP Client: Execute Scraper**
  ![üß©](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/puzzle-piece_1f9e9.png)

  * Connects directly to Bright Data‚Äôs backend to run the scraper tool.
* üí¨ **OpenAI Chat Model**
  ![üß†](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/brain_1f9e0.png)

  * Optional: If your Agent needs an LLM to generate instructions or parse dynamic websites, it talks to OpenAI here.
* üóÇÔ∏è **Output Parser: Backlink JSON**
  ![üóÇÔ∏è](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/card-index-dividers_1f5c2-fe0f.png)

  * Ensures the Agent‚Äôs raw text comes out as **structured JSON** ‚Üí easy to split & save later.

---

### üí° **Beginner Benefit**

‚úÖ **No coding scraping:** You don‚Äôt have to build scrapers from scratch. Bright Data + Agent handles the hard part.
‚úÖ **Dynamic parsing:** The OpenAI node helps the Agent handle weird or changing HTML structures.
‚úÖ **Safe & scalable:** MCP proxies handle geo-blocks and captchas for you.

---

---

## ‚úÖ **üü¢ SECTION 3: Transform & Store**

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Nodes**

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Function: Split Backlinks**
![üîÄ](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/repeat-button_1f501.png)

* **What it does:** Takes the JSON output of all backlinks and splits them into **one item per backlink**.
* **Why:** So each backlink becomes its own row when sent to Google Sheets.

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets: Append Backlinks**
![üìÑ](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/page-facing-up_1f4c4.png)

* **What it does:** Adds each backlink as a **new row** in your Google Sheet.
* **Columns:** Domain, URL, anchor text, date, category, etc.

---
